data.description:
Do you have the skills to handle high-pressure situations with precision?

In "Police Response VR: Disturbance," there's no option to run away.

Navigate through intense scenarios where timing and judgment are everything. As an officer, you must assess each situation dynamically and react appropriately, avoiding excessive force to rise through the ranks.

Game Modes:
Easy Mode - Rookie Training:

Perfect for beginners.
Practice your weapon-drawing skills without the risk of failure.
Default mode to help you get started.
Normal Mode - Professional Duty:

Designed for the true professional.
Experience the game as intended, with rapidly changing circumstances that test your ability to respond to any situation. Draw too soon and you will fail.

Gear Up:
Sidearm Pistol
Taser
Pepper Spray
Handcuffs
Police Dog (Unlocked after 10 years service)

You have three lives to complete your 30-year career and reach your retirement locker.

Are you ready to respond, officer?

changelog.change_log: Added dog to many more levels. Dog is now in majority of call outs when playing in Realism Mode.
Removed the double Audio when you enter the training room

Fixed bug that was repeating party in the street scenario at Whiskey Crescent giving false fails when the level loads a second time. Apologies to those Officers affected. You should now get called out to other jobs at that location again.

Binary version V1.1.34 Code 134 Release Notes
MAJOR POLICE DOG UPDATE All Officers will receive a Police Dog Partner after 10 years of service. You can still use your issued equipment of Taser, CS and Pistol. To instruct the dog to attack simply grab your Police Whistle and blow it whilst pointing at your target with your other hand. Your loyal dog will understand your instruction and attack immediately. Your dog is currently added to 33% of the game. We are working to put the dog into 100% of the game. Please give us your feedback after your shift to let us know how it went.
